services.biofertilizer: A biofertilizer rich in beneficial bacteria and natural enzymes that increase the fertility of the land It raises the plantâ€™s immunity and increases its activity. It is completely free of chemicals and pathogens and is suitable for any plant and strengthens growth.
services.nurtured: A biofertilizer rich in beneficial soil microorganisms!
services.fertilizer: An organic fertilizer that contains all the major and minor elements that the plant needs It improves soil fertility and water retention!

aboutPage.aboutText: The company produces the best organic fertilizer in the world by recycling plant and animal waste by analyzing it and adding some types of bacteria and algae, then Providing it to vermicompost worms, which are a type of earthworms, which feed on these wastes and turn them into vermicompost fertilizer.
aboutPage.Goal1: Reducing the harm of environmental pollutants resulting from burning agricultural waste .
aboutPage.Goal2: Producing organic fertilizer that is very safe for humans and animals and free of pathogens and weed seeds .
aboutPage.Goal3: Reviving and enriching agricultural soil fertility .
aboutPage.Goal4: Producing healthy crops free of chemical fertilizer residues .
aboutPage.Goal5: Bridging the gap resulting from the shortage and high cost of chemical fertilizers and eliminating the negative effects they cause .
aboutPage.Goal6: Producing high-quality fruits and crops suitable for export .

contactPage.help: We are here to help you !
